notConfigured.text: Your Homarr instance does not have Docker configured or it has failed to fetch containers. Please check the documentation on how to set up the integration.

selectBoard.title: Choose a board
selectBoard.text: Choose the board where you want to add the apps for the selected Docker containers.

success.title: Added apps to board
success.message: The apps for the selected Docker containers have been added to the board.

error.title: Failed to add apps to board
error.message: The apps for the selected Docker containers could not be added to the board.
